Articles.Content:
Hello,

somehow I activated this tool and I don't know how. How can I deactivate it to go on building?

![c14dtsE.jpg?1](http://i.imgur.com/c14dtsE.jpg?1)

Click the circular 'Place' icon.

If all else fails save your ship, exit the game and restart. Pretty much guaranteed this will reset any such problem.
They respond to the numbers keys 1, 2, 3, and 4, as well as directly clicking them.

Hi gonzo, press 1 or click the other icons ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Urgh double ninja'd!

Hi,

restart the game solved it. Even going back back to main menu wasn't enough.
